title: Drug-Induced Disease Classes: Systematic Taxonomy of Iatrogenic Predictions

metabolic_disruption.description: Glucose-lowering drugs causing hypoglycemia (sulfonylureas, insulin, TZDs, SGLT2i)

cardiac_toxicity.description: Proarrhythmic/negative inotrope drugs (CCBs, Class Ic, Class III)
cardiac_toxicity.reason: Other antiarrhythmics (sotalol/quinidine/adenosine) treat arrhythmias - not inverse

steroid_adverse_effects.description: Corticosteroid-specific AEs (glaucoma, osteoporosis, pancreatitis, TB, IPF)

hormonal_disruption.description: Thyroid drugs, vitamin D analogs, GnRH agonists

immune_mediated_toxicity.reason: Known TEN drugs (allopurinol, phenytoin, lamotrigine) don't have TEN predictions

cns_effects.reason: All SSRIs/SNRIs cause mania in bipolar - class effect

procarcinogenic.reason: Same carcinogenic mechanism as estradiol (WHI trial)

vascular_toxicity.reason: Other NSAIDs don't have vascular disease predictions

bradykinin_accumulation.reason: ACEi cause angioedema via bradykinin accumulation

gt_quality_finding.description: 38 GT entries are actually inverse indications (drug CAUSES disease)
examples: conjugated estrogens → breast cancer (WHI: estrogens cause breast cancer)
gt_quality_finding.action: Inverse indication filter correctly overrides erroneous GT entries

rejected_expansions.statins_diabetes: Benefit outweighs risk - statins recommended for all diabetic patients
rejected_expansions.bromocriptine_dyskinesia: DA agonists treat, not cause, movement disorders
rejected_expansions.dopamine_drugs_filter: Already FILTER tier, no metric impact
